article_title: Rand Paul, in his own words
article_text: - Sen. Rand Paul, (R-Ky.), who announced he's running for president in 2016, is known for his belief in limited government. Here his take on Obamacare, the Constitution and more, in his own words. ()

- Sen. Rand Paul, (R-Ky.), who announced he's running for president in 2016, is known for his belief in limited government.
Here his take on Obamacare, the Constitution and more, in his own words.
